title: An Enquiry concerning the Principles of Morals

texts.title: Section 1. Of the General Principles of Morals
texts.sourceDesc: The first more or less complete edition of Hume’s <cite>Essays and Treatises on Several Subjects</cite>, his collected philosophical works, was published in 1758, although each of its component works were published separately before then, and an incomplete version (predating the <cite>Four Dissertations</cite>) was published in 1753. Our copytext is the posthumous edition of 1777, which Hume was working on before he died, and which contains many final alterations.
